phrs.translation: n. 局部麻醉；局部麻醉剂；局麻药

sentences.sentence: Every year, 5,000 people have life-threatening reactions to anaesthetics.
sentences.translation: 每年，有5000人会对麻醉剂产生致命的不良反应。

sentences.sentence: He hired a new consultant in anaesthetics.
sentences.translation: 他雇用了一名新的麻醉学顾问医生。

sentences.sentence: You may wonder why having a horn cut off requires anaesthetics.
sentences.translation: 你可能会觉得奇怪，为什么去掉牛角需要麻醉?。
